memberdef.name: R_NON_W_ALLOC
memberdef.initializer: 0x1U /* Do not allocate Read, Allocate Write */

memberdef.name: R_ALLOC_W_NON
memberdef.initializer: 0x2U /* Allocate Read, Do not allocate Write */
